agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Ways & Means TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: JHR 140 CHAIR: Rep. Dustin Burrows HB 263 Thompson, Ed Relating to an exemption from motor vehicle sales and use taxes for certain previously leased motor vehicles. HB 279 Craddick Relating to authorizing the Midland County Hospital District of Midland County, Texas, to impose a sales and use tax. HB 569 Capriglione Relating to the information required to be included in or with a school district ad valorem tax bill. HB 639 Springer Relating to the eligibility of land used as an ecological laboratory for appraisal for ad valorem tax purposes as qualified open-space land. HB 648 Krause Relating to the substitution of a local sales and use tax for property taxes imposed by certain local governments; authorizing the imposition of a tax. HB 916 Guillen Relating to the exemption of rural transit districts from motor fuel taxes. HB 994 Guillen Relating to the procedures for protests and appeals of certain ad valorem tax determinations. The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the Chair. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
